Row.Text: Shamanic Circle [ICON_RES_MANPOWER]

Grands a free [ICON_CULTURE] Social Policy and all new, in this City trained military land [ICON_SILVER_FIST] units get the free Promotion "Haka War Dance"[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Requires a [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Shaman Hut[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE] in each of your Cities.[NEWLINE]Becomes obsolete with the discovering of Philosophy.
Provides a boost for [ICON_RELIGION] Faith and [ICON_CULTURE] Culture and a free [ICON_CULTURE] Social Policy.
upps
Tribe Hut [ICON_RES_MANPOWER]
Provides a free [ICON_FLOWER] Settler.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Requires a [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Chieftain Hut[ENDCOLOR] to be build.
Provides a free Settler.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]You may build one.
upps
Treasure House [ICON_RES_MANPOWER]

+10% [ICON_GOLD] Gold in this city.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Provides two extra [ICON_TRADE] trade routes.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Enemy Plunderrate increased by 10%.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]In every of your cities must build a Market.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Requires five [ICON_RES_MANPOWER] Manpower.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Hierachy[ENDCOLOR] must be discovered.
Increases massiv the [ICON_GOLD] Gold and also boost [ICON_TRADE] Trade route [ICON_GOLD] Gold income in this City.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+2 [ICON_TRADE] Trade Routes.
Gigant [ICON_RES_MANPOWER]
Add yields +1 [ICON_PEACE] Faith to every Menhir you own.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Requires at least five Menhir to be build and two [ICON_RES_MANPOWER] Manpower.
Provides a boost to [ICON_PEACE] Faith in your Empire.
Senat [ICON_RES_MANPOWER]

[ICON_GOLDE_AGE] Golden Ages are now +10% longer and +1 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness for each 5 [ICON_CULTURE] Social Policies you have adopted.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Requirement[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]5 [ICON_RES_MANPOWER] Manpower are needed.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Also your Empire must have at least five cities.
Provides a boost foward to the lenght of [ICON_GOLDE_AGE] Golden Ages and [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness
upps
National Court [ICON_RES_MANPOWER][ICON_ORDER]
upps

+10 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness, when the [ICON_CULTURE] Socoal Policy Sovereignty is adopted.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Provides a free [ICON_CULTURE] Social Policy.[NEWLINE]Add yields +3 [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age Points.[NEWLINE]Increase [ICON_ORDER] Order by +2.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Note[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]Requires 3 Courthouse in your civilization to be build.
Big boost for [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness when the [ICON_CULTURE] Social Policy Sovereignty is adopted.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Grants one free [ICON_CULTURE] Social Policy.
National Health System [ICON_RES_MANPOWER][ICON_HEALTH]

+1 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness for each city you control and adds +1 yield [ICON_RESEARCH] Science to each Hospital.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Note[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]Requires a Hospital in each of your cities and the more cities you have the more it cost to build.[NEWLINE]Increase [ICON_HEALTH] Health by +3.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Requires[ENDCOLOR] 10 [ICON_POWER3] Electricity.
Boost global [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness and also a little [ICON_RESEARCH] Science boost.
upps
National Harvest [ICON_RES_MANPOWER]

-5% [ICON_HAPPINESS_4] Unhappiness in all of your cities and add yield +1 [ICON_FOOD] Food to each harvest.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Requires a Harvest in all of your cities and the more cities you have the more it cost to build.
upps
Provides a boost for global [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness and adds + 1 [ICON_FOOD] Food for each Harvest you own.
Silo ([ICON_RES_MANPOWER][ICON_HEALTH])
+10% [ICON_FOOD] Food in this city.[NEWLINE]Increase [ICON_HEALTH] Health by +1.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]May build up to two.
Provides a 10% [ICON_FOOD] Food boost in the city it is build.

Archaeological ruins and ancient texts show that silos were used in ancient Greece as far back as the late 8th century BC, as well as the 5th Millennium B.C site of Tell Tsaf, Israel. The term silo is derived from the Greek σιρός (siros), "pit for holding grain". The first modern silo, a wooden and upright one filled with grain, was invented and built in 1873 by Fred Hatch of McHenry County, Illinois, USA
Barde [ICON_RES_MANPOWER]
+1 [ICON_PEACE]Faith for each Folklore and provides one free [ICON_GREAT_MUSICIAN] Musician.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]The building Folklore must build in all cities The more cities you have the more it cost.
upps.
Provides a free Musician, a Faith boost and two Musik Slots.

+2 [ICON_GOLD] Gold and +1 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Global Happiness for every Shrine you own.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Note[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]You must build a Shrine in each of your cities, the more cities you have the more it cost.
National Shrine [ICON_RES_MANPOWER]
Add yields +2 [ICON_GOLD] Gold and +1 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness to every Shrine.
